title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes          Fees There is no cost for visitors to enter Saint Croix Island International Historic Site.  Â       Commercial Tours All commercial tour groups that wish to use the unimproved boat launch at the mainland site on US Route 1 must first obtain a commercial use authorization, available from the concessions manager at Acadia National Park. The fee for obtaining a permit is $200 for a two-year period. For more information, please contact the concessions manager at (207) 288-8705 or by email. Please note that commercial use is prohibited on Saint Croix Island to protect natural and cultural resources; commercial tours are not permitted to land on the island.
